title: runtime: finaliser inconsistency panic needs to be more informative
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

The build regularly fails on freebsd/arm. It is not clear if this is a bug in the
freebsd/arm port, or a real issue in the gc that is only uncovered on this particular
configuration. In either case it would be useful if the panic information gave more
details to promote investigation.
